title: Charles Darwin, theories of European superiority

content.prompt: Which of the following was a major unintended effect of the publication of Charles Darwinâ€™s 1859 work On the Origin of Species?

choices.label: It became the basis for scientific research of human development.
It provided a scientific explanation of the evolution of animals and plants.
It became the basis for all subsequent scientific research on species extinction.
It became the basis of various theories asserting that Europeans were naturally superior to other peoples.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
